input.sentences: took a trip into the city .
browsed a lot of nice shops .
stopped for drinks out on a nice patio .
found a quiet quaint little restaurant to have dinner in .
it was a great day in the city | which looks even more beautiful at night !
output.sentences: Kim's trip to the city was the highlight of her Summer vacation.
She dressed nice and visited all the shops she liked, making sure to hit the entire lot.
She stopped a couple times when she found a nice patio to bask in the atmosphere and relax.
Finally, at the end of each day she would find a nice quiet, quaint restaurant and order a couple beers.
Kim loved the city, no matter the time of day or night and hoped someday she could live there.
